Tournaments

Tie-Break

  1. If a Battle Master or Weaponizer is in the KO Pile, and the match runs to time and damage on all characters is assessed, should they count their damage for that total, or are they simply an upgrade with no damage on them?
    They are an upgrade with no damage on them.
